summary: Albert is smitten for Pola but ends up wrongly committed in jail, in the meantime her affections are sought after by his friend, and on his release both love and friendship must be tested.
cast: Albert Préjean|Pola Illéry|Edmond T. Gréville|Bill Bocket|Paul Ollivier|Gaston Modot|Raymond Aimos|Thomy Bourdelle|Delphine Abdala|Raymond Blot|Léon Courtois|Édouard Francomme|André Michaud|Jane Pierson|Louis Pré Fils|Eugène Stuber|Louis Zellas
title: Bajo los techos de París
